head.title: Our quality - we operate a strict star rating system | Interhome
head.description: One of Interhome’s main strengths is that we’re always there when you may need us. Interhome staff, partner agencies and key holders welcome and assist guests on-site and provide comprehensive service. This local presence means that Interhome guests enjoy a straightforward handover, assistance with the organisation of any activities as a personal contact in case of any needed support and advice.

content.text:
At Interhome we operate a strict star rating system which means that you can be confident that the accommodation you book will be of the standard as you expect. Our service teams carry out regular checks of our properties and any changes are updated. Our star rating system means you can book our properties with confidence no matter what kind of holiday accommodation or which holiday destination you choose.

Luxury furnishings ★★★★★ >> To search: 5 stars
Unique and exquisite with the highest possible standards of both furnishings and luxuries. Set in wonderful surroundings. Suitable for guests looking for the very best in both quality and luxury.

Top quality furnishings ★★★★ >> To search: at least 4 stars
Very nice, high quality, often with many extra luxuries. Ideal for guests looking for comfort and quality.

Comfortable furnishings ★★★ >> To search: at least 3 stars
Comfortable and tasteful. Above average standard. Ideal for guests who enjoy a nice, comfortable holiday home.

Basic furnishings ★★ >> To search: at least 2 stars
Average standard with practical furnishings usually in local style. Ideal for guests who do not require a great deal of home comfort.

Simple furnishings ★ >> To search: at least 1 star
Very modest with little comfort. Mostly with older furnishings. Ideal for guests who are on a tight budget looking for a bargain.

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Hand-picked and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: In-resort service and a 24/7 helpline
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and information about your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it than in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, experience the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or indulge yourself in the luxury of a Spanish Villa. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online with us - it is quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
